values:
Newwww tattoo!

It's a moogle, just got it yesterday wif my birthday moneys. :D

Wanna see? I know you do:

The ball drops!
Anyone could get it
Anyone could get it.. done.

One more stamp!
This could be my last chance
This could my only.. chance.

My heart stops to the sound
Of a woman yelling in the crowd
But forty-eight will never be the same.
My heart races back and forth
To the continuation of the game
Forty-eight will never be the same.

I can't stop!
My hand is the in air
My fist presents the glory.

Of.

I go on!
My signature is forced
As I bundle up the money.

My heart stops to the sound
Of a woman yelling in the crowd
But forty-eight will never be the same.
My heart races back and forth
To the continuation of the game
Forty-eight will never be the same.

by John Sims/Jack Crowder;

Sh-sh-sh-sh-she's a bomb /
And I'm left ruined in her wake /
Whatever she gives /
Well then it's double she'll t-t-take.

Run, / she says, /
In a room full of scissors /
She bleeds, / and screams /
As she looks in the mirror.

Sh-sh-sh-sh-she's a bomb /
That no one c-c-can diffuse /
Whatever the payout /
If you gamble with her you'll lose.

Run, / she says, /
In a room full of scissors /
She bleeds, / and screams /
As she looks in the mirror. /
I can't / I won't /
Leave her alone here /
The fog / is thick /
As we choke on the night air.

Both our thoughts are forgiven.
And our dreams are betrayed.
I thought it would be easy.
You aren't like other girls.
So if you're ready for fantasy.
Well, baby, so am I.

by: John Sims (hey wait, that's me, huh?)

Forgery of a love that disappeared
Into the depths of the ocean, insincere
I never knew what it was like to be alone
But now I'm alone with you (alone with you).

So much for my defeatist attitude
You beat me to the sucker-punch, my dear
So much for drinking and dancing the night away
At least I have the alcohol, anyway.

Promises of the life everyone should have
Happy and full, our cups never empty and
You said "don't worry, I'll never leave you,"
Words disguise the fact that you're tired of me.

So much for love -
So much for cheesy horror flicks.
So much for heart-shaped flasks.
So much for us, I never asked
To be the one you said you loved.
So much for you and I.

"Another Way to Say Goodbye (fuck off)"
yet again, by: me [John Sims]
There's no way out
The lines are all crossed out
And I'm far from home.

You're all I've got
Realize it or not
But I wanna be alone.

Never should it ever come to this
I gotta tell you what I haven't missed
I've been heartbroke & confused & insincere
Looking for another way to say goodbye.

Getting out has never looked so good
I let you down just like I knew I would
Quit being happy with you (like I should)
I gotta get up & get out & get on my feet again!

There's one way out
I know without a doubt
That I cannot stay.

I can see that
I won't miss you
More or less than words can say.

Never should it ever come to this
I gotta tell you what I haven't missed
I've been heartbroke & confused & insincere
Looking for another way to say goodbye.

Getting out has never looked so good
I let you down just like I knew I would
Quit being happy with you (like I should)
I gotta get up & get out & get on my feet again!

"Wish You Well,"
 also by: me [John Sims]

It lies within
Under the surface
Pretext to a life that's less than perfect.

Haunting me
With the eyes
Of a thousand chosen travelers.

It must be a
Tragedy
To think that none of them may make it to the...

Other side of the wishing well
Trapped for life in this living hell
There's no one to open this tiny cell
There's no way out!

Oh, I wish I could wish you well.
I wish you well.
I wish I could wish you well.
I wish you well.

"Even (the brightest) Stars Burn (out)"
 by: me [John Sims]

She says
I'm really trying to quit
I've cut down
Don't do as much anymore.
She says
I've got alot of self control
Help me
Help me make it through...

Tonight, the stars are all out
But my favorite one is her.
There's a million different spots of light
But she shines them all out.

She says
Let's go for a spin
Head east
Never looking back again.
She says
I wonder if I'll ever miss
That life
Like it never even did exist.

Tonight, the stars are all out
But my favorite one is her.
There's a million different spots of light
But she shines them all out.

She shines them all out.
She starts to burn out.

by John Sims:

This is a song for the working class
This is a fucking tragic epic of truth
We do not want to live in poverty
Give the world to it's new owners, the youth!

Not another political tune
We're not another political band
We just want what's right and fair
Kill incumbents to restore fresh air. Hey!

I call on you to speak your mind
I call for peace across the land
This is for those across the seas
Who didn't want to give blood for oil!

Not another political tune
We're not another political band
We just want what's right and fair
Overthrow America to keep our pride, Hey!

Listen close to the message inside
War on Terror is War on Pride
Privacy and policy both victims of hate
Tear down a country that we didn't create!

We cannot breed this love of death
We cannot breed ignorance and greed
Give the world to the few free thinkers
American youth demands to be freed!

Not another political tune
We're not another political band
We just want what's right and fair
Fuck the government cuz they don't care!

by: John Sims

Go away from me right now
As I slip further from my own sight
Tonight was supposed to be special
But you made it just another night
Void of all feeling and bleeding and life.

My heart was yours to have and to own
But that just wouldn't be enough for you
I give you credit on your taste
My heart would not beat for so precious few
Moments of feeling and fleeting teen angst.

I shouldn't be so broken and bruised
At the thought of seeing myself lose
Why can't I grow up, learn love is a lie
And slip into the depths of a life
Where all I have are fallacies.

You'd rather be anywhere than being with me
And I'm counting the minutes til you ask me to
  leave.
You'd rather be anywhere than being with me
And I'm counting the minutes til you tell me I
  should just leave.
I should leave.

I shouldn't be so broken and bruised
At the thought of seeing myself lose
Why can't I grow up, learn love is a lie
And slip into the depths of a life
Where all I have are fallacies.

Maybe you're right, maybe I've outstayed my
  welcome...
Maybe I should just leave...

Vivid images flash through my mind
Taking me back to when we were innocent
Feelings more pure and hearts on fire
We were the chosen ones
The youth who would bring the world together
Ignorant happiness and flighty arrogance
Our problems engulfed by overwhelming abundance
The whites of our souls bleached
Washed clean by the sins of our parents
The ones who truly sacrifice themselves daily
So that we can grow to bear the children
Keepers of tomorrow who will conquer all
And feel the same damned childhood
Wide-eyed and unready to face what life is
The fleeting hopes unraveling day by day
Not knowing the actions occurring around them
Metaphors brought down from the heavens
To a child who is unsure of what it means
But it is encouragement and support that helps
All the metaphors in the world cannot help
The soothing voices assuaging their fears
And all we have in the end really is love
The love we pass down through our generations.

The soft glass shatters in my wake
Night air rushing quickly to my lungs
Did you hear that?  Did you see that?

The impeding ground glorifies my fall
Impact collapsing my ability to breathe
Did I really hear that?
Did I really feel that?

The barrel of your smoking gun
Was pointed at my wicked heart
The only thing that I had left inside.
Free me from hypocrisy
And give me reasoning to see, because
I'm missing all that I had left inside.

Inhaling in and breathing out
Impurities are mixed with doubt
Did you hear that?  Can you see that?

Fighting feelings isn't brave and
Words cannot explain the heartbreak
Did you hear that?  Did you see that?

The barrel of your smoking gun
Was pointed at my wicked heart
The only thing that I had left inside.
Free me from hypocrisy
And give me reasoning to see, because
I'm missing all that I had left inside.

Did you hear that?  Can't you see that...
I could never live without you
I wish that I could just tell the truth.
Reality is never really through.

Crashing through the doors
He never heard the sound
The sound of all he left behind
And all he'd never have.

Fighting through the crowd
He follows her all night
Too nervous still to talk
He never sees her face again.

All too well life passes you by
Time will not abandon those
Who cannot seem to fly.
All too well chances gone awry
No choice but to abandon those
Who cannot seem to try.

Slowing down the pace
He stops to catch a thought
One more day is way too much
He's screaming out her name.

All too well life passes you by
Time will not abandon those
Who cannot seem to fly.
All too well chances gone awry
No choice but to abandon those
Who cannot seem to try.

All too well
He wishes he could fly
No one will abandon him tonight.

Blood red vision of betrayal,
He wasn't there enough, she said.
Jade green beat of envy revealed,
She wouldn't talk to me, he said.

Love is shared paycheck to paycheck,
Hearts become casualties.
No need to worry about feelings,
It's love in the Fiscal year.

True blue is the color forgotten,
Loved for the wrong reasons, she said.
Pure white, tainted and fades to black,
She lost her innocence, he said.

Love is shared paycheck to paycheck,
Hearts become casualties.
No need to worry about feelings,
It's love in the Fiscal year.

Pent up fucking animosity,
I'm so sick of being the nice guy.
Quit kicking me in the face,
Stop making me say I'm sorry,
Stop being so much better than me.

I can't ever be what you want,
All I can be is depressed for you.
How can you think any good of me,
When all I shed is blood and tears?

I can't penetrate your mind,
Helpless without the control of knowing.
You never voice your thoughts.
What the hell did you think of me,
Before I slipped away?

Die, die, fucking die!
That's all I wanna do now.
One second I am in your graces,
The next you could care less.
I'm sick of being pathetic.

By: John Sims on 01-26-03

Ambiguous feelings uniting
A broken country,
Incurable liars turn the
Fingers on their own people.
The political machine using
War for popularity,
But when it's settled
Who's on their side?

Avoiding accusations with
More displacement of the problems,
Terrorism is in the eye of the beholder
Or whoever holds the highest office.
So when it's time to cast your ballot
Make sure they buy your vote,
After all, they can afford it
You pay their salaries anyway.

Fighting for unjustifiable causes
Let's increase the budget for defense,
Leave the people on the street where they are
If they want food, they'll have to enlist.
The sad reality is forced into motion
Even time doesn't have the power to halt it,
Every day I cringe to hear the news
And learn which freedom we lost this time.

By: John Sims (August 24, 2002)

When all is said,
And you are dead,
Did you ever live,
In life?

The principles of thought,
The meaning of a heart,
When all is lost,
Can you find the way?

I hope you have freedom,
The spectacle of choice,
Our country can't provide
Equality.

Sickness plagues the land,
Yet is stopped by just one hand,
Ignorance is dropped,
But it's too late.

Too much lament falls on those,
Who cannot choose, but rightly chose,
To hate and never learned,
To tolerate.

For once I wish it all to end,
This disease of mind among all men,
And prosperity to replace the,
Insecurities within.

I'm fucking sorry for being stupid.  I should never take anything that people say at face value anymore.  God forbid someone ever mean what they say.  But it doesn't matter, because it's just me.  Who cares what I feel?

"Let Me Flee" By: John Sims Fickle incantations of hope Underlying thoughts of why I can't overcome Fleeting dreams are all I have Lost in a sea of possibilites. You're the reason I go on, Sick of pleasing you, I run. No escape, from your eyes. They burn a gaping hole in my chest. You steal my heart and conquer me. Why can't you just let me flee? No more pestilence to inflict I'm just an effigy to your sad inclinations Evading traps to change my mind Your gimmick won't win a place in my heart. You're the reason I can't win, I fear the wolf that's entered my den. No escape, from your lies. They burn a gaping hole in my chest. You steal my mind and conquer me. Why can't you just let me flee? Subtle venoms you slip for me Apothecary for my mind, you become Indecisive if I should live or die I cannot live this kind of life. You're the reason I am weak, Timid, shy, hidden, and meek. No escape, from your cries. The burn a gaping hole in my ears. You steal my love and conquer me. Why can't you just let me flee?

By: John Sims, of course.

Dunno the language,
The lies that you polish,
The pain that is given
And sold on the market.

Dunno your blind truths
And hidden agendas,
Seems like you always
Speak with a front.


You don't feel a fucking thing.
You will steal what you want for free.
You don't have any sympathy.
You would steal everything from me.


Your politics cloudy,
Your friendships unsure.
You don't even value,
What you can't even score.

Beliefs are opinions,
Yet you have none.
Not a shred of diplomacy,
Even under the gun.

"Desperation" My head is reeling from the sensory images, The pictures feeding into my skull like bullets, Rippling through flesh and gray matter, Injecting my mind with new disillusions of thought. Here my physical self decays with jealousy, The feelings of self-betrayal of foreknowledge, Knowing you lay with him under the fully lit moonroof, I locked these nightmares inside of my own asylum walls. All I need is a bitter desperation, Separation from the feeling of fright, Dying alone every night, I live my life in soured resignation; exasperation. I will always let stray thoughts linger into how I am a failure, How I could never accomplish the goals that I never bother to set, Yet always seem to come so close to attaining, Yet falling just short of the line you set up and drew for me. All I need is a bitter desperation, Separation from the feeling of fright, Dying alone every night, I live my life in soured resignation; exasperation.

"Life in Static"

Up on the scaffolding,
The birds are envious,
Wishing they could fly as me,
Living life dangerously.

Up on the rooftop,
I can only imagine,
The thoughts of an eagle,
Maybe this time I'll soar.

Should just be ecstatic,
That my life is not static,
Stationary directions,
Cannot pull me away.

Down to the Earth,
I fall lifelessly, limp,
My senses dull quietly,
The pavement is soft.

Downward to the core,
The center of Earth,
Regaining composure,
I run to the door.

Upward my hand goes,
Reaching for the knob,
The hand is successful,
But the door, it is locked.

Should just be ecstatic,
My life is not static,
Stationary directions,
Cannot pull me away.

Up on the rooftop,
I can only imagine,
The thoughts of an eagle,
Maybe this time I'll soar.

"Defeated, Still Winning" The nights of unfueled hate, The whispers in the breeze, I fall into the rain, With tears of pure sulfate. And I won't tumble down, And falter into place. My faults all scream release, Filling up my mouth, I drown. The day has passed so slow, Work fulfilled with despair. The sun dies in the sky, Leaving the new moon's glow. Celestial lovers meet, Blowing kisses of shooting stars. Indebted to the galaxy, Our ill-fated couple pass. Desireful, wandering pawn, Alone, but happy still. Nature and beauty are his muse, They play him as a fool.

"Clouded Mind" Sit down We need to talk About the world And what's going on In your head. Stand up Take another crack At it Take another swing At me Make yourself proud. All the time Lacking judgement You shouldn't Be alone. Never took The time to look At those who'd Stand by you. Sit down And realize now How desperate And bleak things get When all you need Is space. Stand up And find someone now Not everyone Will hurt you Odds are you'll Find more like you. All the time Lacking friendship You shouldn't Be alone. Never took The time to look At those who'd Stand with you.

Which Empire Records Character Are You? Find out @ She's Crafty
Which Hacker's Character Are You? Find out @ She's Crafty

"A Brief Epiphany" By: John Sims Airy, mysterious, wiry figure, Teach me the err of my ways. I've bowed here in worship, Amazed and dumbfounded, Never quite so disarrayed. My mind here a blank, It begs to be filled. Never before have I marvelled, Wondered at such a thing, My eyes surely deceive tonight. Hardy and untouched by negativity, My love here obeys by my whims. Flowered and fertilized, Emotions inside of myself blossom, Into a staircase that leads to the heart. My lonliness reaches inside of me, Yet cannot seem to make me hollow. The sound of my own voice, Soft and restrained in my room, Echoes quietly inside of my ears. The happiness I cannot reach, Cannot escape, corrupts my face. The expression on my lips, Confusion and uncertainty aside, Curls into complacency.

Watching the lines,
Narrowing the eyes.
The hazy, cloudy skies,
Cannot disguise,
The feeling despised,
Our freedom realized.
With the crimson death rise.

Can you feel it?
The ground shaking slowly.
Rumbling, sifting out the grains.
Grains of men,
Who will lose their lives,
In vain.

Watching the lines,
Narrowing the eyes.
The hazy, cloudy skies,
Cannot disguise,
The feeling despised.
Our freedom realized,
With the crimson death rise.

I am frightened.
My best friend just lost his life.
He was eighteen,
Never should have made it here.
Yet he caught a bullet in the skull,
For a war he never believed in.

Watching the lines,
Narrowing the eyes.
The hazy, cloudy skies,
Cannot disguise,
The feeling despised.
Our freedom realized,
With the crimson death rise.

The politics of war,
Carry souls to oblivion.
Why should we fight for,
A country that would see us die?
All we want is more.
We shouldn't lose ourselves,
Without knowing who we are.

Watching the lines,
Narrowing the eyes.
The hazy, cloudy skies,
Cannot disguise,
The feeling despised.
Our freedom realized,
With the crimson death rise.

Why am I not suprised,
By the fear held in the eyes,
Or the young soldier's painful cries?
Alone with tearful eyes,
March on to the next death rise.

Shattered Obsidian By: John Sims All I feel is a sense of fault A ping of jealousy that leads to pain A breath of compassion feelings can't halt Your loss is my gain. Comprehension knocks on my mind My thoughts abandoned, later unjoined Oblivion ahead, utopia destroyed Selfishness adopted, the hurting rejoined. You left me shattered In pieces of obsidian My life is nothing but A wrecked monument. I let my agony freeze inside me Like moments of the past we had My bloody chest is still aching But further on I can't see my future. You left me shattered In pieces of obsidian My life is nothing but A wretched monument Of a forgotten time A forgotten romance My heart still lies My mind gives up and dies. Shockwaves spent recussitating my thoughts Like a cataclysmic fall from an invisible cliff Ideas still linger causing unstoppable danger Our worlds connect and we disjoin ourselves. You left me shattered In pieces of obsidian My life is nothing but A monument You left me broken In pieces of obsidian My life is nothing and It never was.

"Problems About Truth / Truth About Problems" By: John Sims Constant abuse enslaving, Prints in my mind engraving, Their words; they are always degrading. Harsher words could not be found, My feelings hurt, I am endlessly drowned, To a world that revolves around penetrating sound. Coping is always the problem. When I'm pressured I can't always pursue, The dream of accomplishing the truth. Why must I always believe them? Floods of emotion, always my downfall, Mentally unstable for a proverbial long haul, I cannot break down, I cannot uninstall. Imperfectly flawed in their minds, One cannot read through the lines, When all of it leads to no signs. Cancerous intentional demise, Sifting through loads of pseudo-false lies, Feeling the nonsense of hope in my eyes. I still can't feel. The absent thrill. The silent chill. That makes me still. And still my will. Amounts to nil.

"Negative, Whore"
by John Sims

Your voice
So true and perky
How could you use it
To lie and to hurt me?
I can't sit here
And take my own thoughts
Mocking myself
Hoping life rots
You fed me your lines
Led me to believe you
Now in hindsight
I can't believe how I never knew
My mind betraying my senses
I should've just known
How can I be hurt so much
And still haven't grown.
Frustration still biting
And clawing at the neck
Of all that is innocent in my
Own retrospect
I haven't been pure
By no means am I perfect
I cannot permit you to
Cause me more defect

You are not
The one I know
The one I know
You are not
Your contempt for me burns
Yet the world it still turns
You break me and hurt me
But you will not destroy me
I will keep on
I'll keep on
I'll keep on
I will not stop.

I'm not garbage.
I'm not your used, recycled trash.
I will not let you treat me like this.
I will not let your abuse affect me.
It can't go on and I won't let it.
I hate being here, but I hate not being here.
I hate being there, but then again here is the same.
Nothing to do, no one to talk to.
All alone with my thoughts that betray me.
All I ever feel is guilt, worry, frustration.
Even my happy moments can't make up.
For in all, my mood is melancholy and unstable.
I can't handle the things you throw my way.
I'm always so fucking helpless.
I'll always be nothing to you.
I'll always mean nothing to myself.
You'll be my world when the world is gone.
You'll be the one I turn to when everyone abandons me.
But you'll be gone, too.
I am not your garbage.
I am not a piece of trash you can throw out.
Yet you make me into one in your mind.
You do not let me vent.
You do not let me cope.
I cannot cope with this.
I will not be sucked down into your bottomless, empty soul.
You hate me, I love you.
This is the story of everyone I know.
I try my best to fill a void that is unimportant.
I overlook the most simple aspects of friendship.
It's my fault that I am treated how I am.
But without confidence and love how do I change this?
I can't will myself, I have no power.
I have no control over my own thoughts.
Even if I did, I'd probably hate myself just as much.
I don't know why I even try anymore.
But I don't want to quit.
You think I should.
Others think I should.
They say I shouldn't.
But deep inside, I can hear their innermost thoughts.
They betray themselves in their mind as well.
They want me to give up, to give in.
Inside I want myself to go on, to conquer.
I don't know if I have the power to do this.
I hate being your used goods.
I hate being your garbage.  Your trash.
You love yourself and only yourself.
In all, can we do anymore?
I can't begin to love you if I don't love myself.
And I wouldn't know if I did love myself.
I'm so confused about everything and you don't help.
You touch a nerve mentally.
I always feel the pain and sting of jealousy.
I can't drown out my misery with apathy.
I can't be narcissistic if I can't love myself.
I can't love myself if I don't know what love means.
I can't know what love means if you keep hurting me.
I love everyone, all the time, but I don't know what it is.
I feel something for you, whether it be good or bad.
I can't be non-biased.
Life doesn't work on lack of emotion.
I've tried to be emotionless and it left me even more dead.
Dead from grief of overbearing feelings.
I hate life, yet I love everything in it.
I hate the way I contradict myself, but it makes so much sense.
Please don't stop treating me the way you do.
I'd be confused if I wasn't your trash.
Your petty, unimportant, used good.

Yours Truly,
Trash (John Sims, February 04, 2002)

Pain Pills You've made me feel numb You've taken my pain away And left me with emptiness. You've made my tongue dumb You've taken my foresight away And left me with clumsiness. No need for medication No need for useless temptation No need to steal a creation My dreams are filled with realization. You... are My pain.. pills You... are My pain.. control You... are My numb.. ness You... are My hollow.. feeling No need for medication No need for useless temptation No need to steal a creation My dreams are filled with realization. You help me.. To achieve.. A higher level.. Of self-awareness.. That comes with.. Lack... of... feeling. Narcotopia.. Purity.. Non-conformity.. Non-stability.

"Don't Talk To Me" by: John Sims Why this time of the year? Why the hatred that comes from the fear? I've heard your ever-present excuse. I won't suffer from your mental abuse. Don't talk to me Don't let the silence get you down. Don't talk to me I cannot swim, I'm bound to drown In the dark sea Of your lies; I won't listen anymore. Don't talk to me I'm not your scapegoat for your pain anymore. Why do you talk me down? Why do you stop me from getting so wound? I can't erase the debt I owe. I can't stop the reaping of the seeds I've sown. (Don't talk to me) Won't let the silence get me down (Don't talk to me) I'll learn to swim and not to drown In the dark sea That was your lies; I open my eyes And I see the light and the transformation That no one ever looks to find. I hear the gentle breeze in the air, And I'm reminded of that time in the field; The time you and I were together, And our hearts were fixed as one; No one could separate us, There was no need to say a word. Don't talk to me, It'll only bring you down. Don't talk to me, You'll stumble and fall straight to the ground. Don't talk to me, The only thing I want cannot be found. Don't leave me please...

"I Will Not Be Pushed Away" by: John Sims (12-13-01) All I have is your soul All you have is my heart Nothing in life is a game No erasing to simply restart I won't let you force me away To leave you alone to cope on your own While I'm left to listen to your eager moan I will not be pushed away! I've never asserted myself to make a position But this time I will not be put in submission To handle the pain of your self-sacrifice Of going it alone, keeping the hurting inside. Your gentle heart, innocently mind Shall not be calloused and injured by time Spent with fears and dread on your chest It'll only help to overcome and put your brain to rest. I won't let you force me away To leave you alone to cope on your own While I'm left to listen to your eager moan I will not be pushed away! This pain that you feel (On my knees I do kneel) Don't let it corrupt you (I told you I'll always love you)

"Friday Rain" by: John Sims I left my home today In search of better things The man I am inside Couldn't handle all the pain. Don't you know I didn't mean To say those spiteful things? I hate myself sometimes I hate you even less. The angry words exchanged Were lain to rest With bitter pain. The storm that started long ago Has been replaced With Friday Rain.

"Heart That Fell" by: John Sims Dislocated Allocated Consecrated Heart Perpetrated Infiltrated Emancipated Heart Give my life to just a thief Reap the pleasures of newfound love Torn by strife that comes with learning My feelings betrayed by one simple yearning Dislocated Allocated Consecrated Heart Perpetrated Infiltrated Emancipated Heart Blessed emotion drives me forward Another new love, another steep drop Much like the rain falling gently outside My pain it wells up, it's my tears that I hide. Dislocated Allocated Consecrated Heart Perpetrated Infiltrated Emancipated Heart Dislocation of my heart Allocation of my emotions Consecration of my love Perpetration of my weakness Infiltration of my feelings Emancipation of my freedom. My.. heart.. falls.
